mapper.update: UPDATE TB_POST SET POST_TITLE = #{post_title}, POST_CONTENT = #{post_content} , UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NUM, POST_TITLE, POSTED_AT, POST_VIEWS, POST_LIKES, USER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, POST_NUM, POST_TITLE, POSTED_AT, POST_VIEWS,POST_LIKES, USER_ID FROM (SELECT POST_NUM, POST_TITLE, POSTED_AT, POST_VIEWS, POST_LIKES,USER_ID FROM TB_POST ORDER BY POST_NUM DESC)) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{selectedNum} * 10) - 9 AND #{selectedNum} * 10
